item.title: Lithium stocks surge after Chinese mine suspends production
item.description: CATL suspended production at the Yichun Project after the mine's permit expired Saturday, the company told CNBC.

item.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Tesla, Snowflake, Apple, Adobe, Arm, CoreWeave, Freeport-McMoRan & more
item.description: Here are Monday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Miner Freeport-McMoRan will benefit from Trump's copper tariffs, says Morgan Stanley
item.description: Freeport-McMoRan might be positioned for meaningful gains on the heels of President Donald Trump's copper tariffs, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: JPMorgan raises price target on CoreWeave heading into earnings, says AI ramp is ‘intact’
item.description: JPMorgan is staying bullish on CoreWeave in the leadup to its quarterly results Tuesday after the bell.

item.title: Nvidia will jump another 20% after report of China export license agreement, Wells Fargo says
item.description: This comes after The FT reported that Nvidia and AMD agreed to give the federal government a 15% share of their revenues from selling certain chips in...
